ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera
Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens - Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II Lens - 500mm Preset Telephoto Lens
Super Wide Angle Lens - 2x Lens - 4 Piece Macro Close Up Set - 3 Piece Filter Kit - TWO 16 GB High Speed Memory Cards
Slave Flash - Professional Size Tripod - Backpack Case - Holster Case - JumpStart DVD Guide
